summary: A New Yorker's life is thrown into a tailspin when his younger cousin surprise-visits him, starting a strange, unpredictable adventure.
cast: John Lurie|Eszter Balint|Richard Edson|Cecillia Stark|Danny Rosen|Rammellzee|Tom DiCillo|Richard Boes|Rockets Redglare|Harvey Perr|Brian J. Burchill|Sara Driver|Paul Sloane
keywords: road movie|independent film|new york city|cult film|low budget film
title: Extraños en el paraíso
